vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an CR Community Retail District on property zoned an R-10(A) Single Family District, on the northwest line of South Belt Line Road, southwest of Seagoville Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval
Z234-141(LC)
